entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
